pregunta: Han dejado un mensaje para ti
respuesta: They have left a message for you
incorrecta1: They left  a message for you
incorrecta2: They leaved  a message for you
incorrecta3: They have leaved   a message for you

pregunta: Se fueron de la ciudad a las 7
respuesta: They left the city at 7 o'clock
incorrecta1: They have left the city at 7 o'clock
incorrecta2: They leaved the city at 7 o'clock
incorrecta3: They have leaved the city at 7 o'clock

pregunta: Se irán de Londres el año que viene
respuesta: They will leave London next year
incorrecta1: They will left London next year
incorrecta2: They will leaved London next year
incorrecta3: They are going to leave London next year

respuesta: They are going to leave soon
incorrecta1: They will left to leave soon
incorrecta2: They will leaved to leave soon
incorrecta3: They will  leave to leave soon
